documentation.author: CERNER
documentation.purpose:
To set the Reg VTE Overlap Therapy Goal based on information residing on the QM VTE Overlap Therapy PowerForm.
This measure assesses the number of patients diagnosed with confirmed VTE who received an overlap of parenteral (intravenous [IV] or subcutaneous [subcu]) anticoagulation and warfarin therapy. For patients who received less than five days of overlap therapy, they must be discharged on both medications. Overlap therapy must be administered for at least five days with an international normalized ratio (INR) greater than or equal to 2 prior to discontinuation of the parenteral anticoagulation therapy or the patient must be discharged on both medications
New for v3.2: For patients who received less than five days of overlap therapy, they should be discharged on both medications or have a Reason for Discontinuation of Overlap Therapy. Overlap therapy should be administered for at least five days with an international normalized ratio (INR) greater than or equal to 2 prior to discontinuation of the parenteral anticoagulation therapy, discharged on both medications or have a Reason for Discontinuation of Overlap Therapy
documentation.explanation: This rule is designed to set the Reg VTE Overlap Therapy Goal based on the values entered in the PowerForm
documentation.query: 08/31/2011 - Removed references to Reg VTE Anticoagulation Administration. TI014394 11/2/11 - Removed Reg VTE Warfin at Discharge = No
documentation.impact:
The following needs to be addressed at each client site:
L11 - All scripts need to be present in any environment this rule is to run in
ALL ACTIONs
VALUE1 needs to be reinstantiated

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_E
templateDefinitions.definition: an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_END_TIME_L
templateDefinitions.definition: a STATUS result exists for EVENT_SET_NAME that is OPT_EVALUATION, OPT_VALUE1 with an event end time within OPT_TIME_NUM, OPT_TIME_UNIT, OPT_DIRECTION, OPT_LINK's event end time.
templateDefinitions.description: Alpha result value, status, event end time

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CODED_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_UNITS_OF_MEASURE on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert. OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

values.value: Reg VTE Warfarin Admin Dt Tm
